 With our intelligent Aira Heat Pump at the heart, we're making the switch to clean energy-tech easier and more affordable. Helping Europe turn off gas and slashing energy costs one home at a time.
   

  

 Founded in 2022, and with 1000+ employees and counting, Aira is driving the clean energy revolution by providing homes with modern clean energy-tech solutions such as solar power, battery storage solutions and heat pumps. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Poland, an HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, and hubs across the UK, Germany, and Italy, Aira is well on track to install clean energy-tech into 5 million homes by 2034.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Backend Engineer on our Billing & Subscriptions team, you'll build the robust systems that power how customers pay for and manage their clean energy solutions. You'll focus on creating secure, scalable backend services that handle billing, payments, and subscription management across multiple markets.
   

  

 In this role, you will:
   

  

  

* Design and build APIs and backend services for billing, payments, and subscription management
* Integrate with payment gateways, banks, and third-party financial services
* Develop automated billing systems, invoice generation, and subscription lifecycle management
* Create secure, scalable systems that handle financial data and transactions
* Build internal tools and services that support our finance operations
* Help scale our payment infrastructure across multiple markets and currencies


 We're making clean energy financing simple and reliable. If you enjoy building robust backend systems that handle mission-critical financial operations, this role is for you.
   

  

**What You Bring To The Team**
* Experience with Java (Spring framework preferred)
* Strong understanding of databases and data modeling
* Experience building APIs and backend services
* Strong attention to detail and commitment to high-quality, well-tested code
* Interest in financial systems and payment processing


**Nice to have:**
* Experience with financial or payment applications
* Security best practices for financial systems
* Experience at fast-growing companies
* Knowledge of microservices architecture


**What is in it for you?**
* Work at a fast-growing clean energy company making a real environmental impact
* Collaborate with international teams and launch products globally
* Build systems that directly impact our core business operations
* Hybrid work flexibility at our new Stockholm office near public transport
* Supportive, inclusive culture with career advancement opportunities


 At Aira, we believe diverse teams build better products. We welcome people from all backgrounds to help us create a cleaner energy future.

title: BI Developer
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization now includes more than 150 highly skilled professionals.
   

  

 Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?
   

  

 Are you passionate about transforming data into powerful insights that drive business success? We're building a world-class Data and Business Intelligence (BI) function to empower our organization with data-driven strategies. Our team is at the forefront of developing a global data platform, pioneering data enablement practices, and delivering impactful BI solutions across the company.
   

  

 We're seeking a Business Intelligence Developer to join our expanding Data & BI Team, with a special focus on the Swedish market. In this role, you'll collaborate with data engineers, our Data Enablement Lead, and local stakeholders to create impactful Power BI solutions that enhance decision-making processes. You'll help shape our data usage across Swedish operations, transforming raw data into valuable insights that drive performance, transparency, and growth.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Craft and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports to support both operational and strategic decision-making in the Swedish market.
* Work closely with stakeholders from finance, operations, and commercial teams to gather requirements and translate them into insightful data visualizations.
* Guarantee the accuracy, consistency, and reliability of BI solutions through thorough testing and validation.
* Enhance existing Power BI reports for improved performance, usability, and clarity.
* Collaborate with data engineers to ensure robust, scalable data pipelines that align with business needs.
* Utilize the Global Data Platform (GDP) to enable insightful and actionable reporting.
* Support the Data Enablement Lead in advocating for BI best practices and encouraging user adoption across Swedish operations.
* Contribute to boosting data literacy and self-service capabilities within the organization.


**Who You Are**
 You possess strong communication skills, enabling you to effectively engage with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Your detail-oriented nature and proactive approach to problem-solving and solution design make you adept at working with complex datasets, translating them into clear and actionable business insights.
   

  

**Experience**
* 5+ years of proven experience in BI/data visualization disciplines.
* Demonstrated experience in Power BI development, with strong skills in DAX, Power Query (M), and data modeling.
* Solid understanding of data warehousing concepts and dimensional modeling.
* Swedish language proficiency is desirable but not essential.
* Experience in property, real estate, or service-based industries is beneficial but not required.


**What We Offer**
* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.


**Excited?**
 If you are excited about being part of a successful team, apply for this position!
   

  

 👉🏽 Why we formed Odevo
   

  

 🔍 About Odevo
   

  

 🌐 Our Software
   

  

 #msl

description:

 **COBOL Developer** 
 to join our team and play a key role in maintaining and modernizing our legacy systems. If you have a passion for problem-solving, optimizing processes, and ensuring system reliability, we’d love to hear from you!
 



**Key Responsibilities:**

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Help us build great products – and shape the future of modern commerce** 

 At 
 
 Litium
 
 , we’re on a mission to help our customers succeed in modern commerce — building the capabilities they need to 
 
 grow their business online
 
 , connect systems and channels, and use 
 
 AI as a foundation
 
  for smarter, faster decisions.
 



  





 We’re now expanding our 
 
 engineering team in Sweden
 
  to lead the way forward.
 



  





 We’re looking for a 
 **Senior Software Engineer** 
  who thrives on building real products, enjoys working across backend, frontend, and AI, and wants to be part of a fast-moving team where architecture, quality, and user experience matter.
 



  




**What you’ll do** 
* Build and maintain product features – hands-on and in collaboration with the team
* Work closely with Product and Design to deliver high-quality user experiences
* Take technical ownership, contribute to architectural decisions, and mentor others
* Help shape and iterate on our 
 
 AI-first approach
 
  – both in the product and in how we work



  




**What we’re looking for** 
* A 
 
 product mindset
 
  – you think beyond code and care about user value
* Experience in our toolset or similar: 
 
 .NET/C#, SQL, Kubernetes, React/TypeScript/Next.js

 AI/ML
 
  and/or 
 
 prompt engineering



  




**Why join us**

 one great platform
 
  used by many

 Product & Tech

 grow as we scale

 We value a 
 
 personal application

 you
 
 , your values, and how you think.
 



  





 If your CV or personal letter feels clearly AI-generated, we’ll decline it

 .
 



  





 Perfect language isn’t what matters – we actually

 !
 



  




**Practical info**

  Hybrid, based in Sweden. Regular time in one of our offices (Stockholm or Jönköping) is expected.

 Swedish language skills are required
 
 .

 .

title: Lead Flutter Developer
description:

 **Help Build the Future of PropTech** 




  





 Imagine a world where renting, managing, and living in properties is simple, smart, seamless, and powered by cutting-edge AI. We're making that a reality.
 



  





 We're transforming the property industry with technology built for humans. From streamlining communication between landlords and tenants to powering predictive insights and automating routine tasks, our platform is already impacting a significant portion of the rental market and we’re just getting started!
 



  





 We're now investing deeply in our App performance, and this is your chance to help lead that journey.

 **Flutter** 
 and scaling them across our platform.
 



 You be optimizing features and solving problems that redefine how people experience housing.

 , with fluency in writing maintainable, performant code

title: Senior Fullstack Software Engineer – Embedded & Cloud Systems
description:
**About**
 Echandia Marine is a leading innovator in sustainable marine battery systems, providing cutting-edge technology to enable cleaner, more efficient marine transport. Our mission is to revolutionize the maritime industry through advanced battery technology, improving efficiency and reducing environmental impact.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Senior Fullstack Software Engineer to join our growing software team. In this role, you will design and build scalable, high-performance applications that connect embedded systems, cloud infrastructure, and user interfaces. Your work will directly support the monitoring, diagnostics, and control of our marine battery systems and at the same time support our developing efforts in cloud with both frontend and backend work.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and implement software for battery management system based on maritime standards
* Build robust APIs and backend services to interface with embedded systems and cloud platforms in a Linux environment.
* Develop intuitive and responsive front-end interfaces for internal tools and customer-facing dashboards.
* Collaborate with embedded, test, and systems engineers to ensure seamless integration across the stack.
* Implement secure, scalable, and maintainable software architectures.
* Contribute to DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and automated testing.
* Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and technical mentoring.


**Required Skills**
* Strong experience in fullstack development using modern frameworks, preferably Angular, Typescript and C#.
* Proficiency in designing RESTful APIs and working with IoT Solutions.
* Strong experience in developing hardware-near applications
* Solid understanding of software architecture, security, and performance optimization.
* Familiarity with data visualization, telemetry, and system monitoring tools.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


**Bonus Points**
* Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
* Experience with Agile development methodologies.
* Experience in developing embedded applications using C.
* Experience with Linux systems administration.
* Experience with CI/CD and build automation with GitHub Actions
* Familiarity with databases (SQL and NoSQL) and message brokers (e.g., MQTT, Kafka).
* Knowledge of maritime compliance standards


 Echandia is challenging the maritime industry with safer electrification. Since its founding in 2018, Echandia has rapidly become a global leader in maritime battery systems, delivering nearly 70 systems for electrification projects worldwide. Our systems are tailored to optimize energy efficiency and reduce environmental impact, supporting the maritime industry’s transition towards sustainable operations. Based in Stockholm, we serve customers across the globe.

title: Tech Lead / Senior Fullstack Developer for the Retail Portal, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Would you like to work with a high-performance team that builds products for our Retail and Partner business? Are you looking to create value and be part of a diverse international environment? Look no further! PostNord, the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions in the Nordic region, is seeking a Tech Lead to join our tech transformation.
   

  

**You, Us & The Job**
 We are seeking a
 **dynamic, enthusiastic,** 
 and
 **solution-oriented individual** 
 to join us as a Tech Lead. If you are passionate about solving practical challenges, thrive in an agile environment, and want to make a meaningful impact in the retail area, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 The role is
 **Tech Lead** 
 for the development and maintenance of Retail Portal which is used as management tool for the Retail solutions in the Nordic countries.
   

  

 What will you do?
   

  

 As a Tech Lead you will be part of an agile team that has cutting-edge expertise in this area.Part of your time will be spent doing what we expect you to love – coding.
   

  

 As a Tech Lead you also have the responsibility for setting the technical vision for our solutions, coaching team members on technical decisions and being a close sparring partner in discussions with your Product Owner.
   

  

 The Team is always in focus so it’s important that you are a good team player, and you help them grow.
   

  

 Who are we looking for?
   

  

 As a person, you are committed, curious and unpretentious. You know a lot, are humble when you don’t, and are eager to learn. We believe that you have several years of experience as a developer and can take lead and drive a task from need to deployment if needed.
   

  

* Technical expertise: You should be a master of the technology stack used by the team and have a deep understanding of software development principles, coding practices, and architecture.
* Leadership skills: You'll be responsible for leading and guiding the development team towards our set goals. We're looking for someone who can not only lead the team's daily work but also empower the team to take ownership and drive the development initiatives forward. You should be able to inspire and motivate team members and be comfortable making technical decisions. You will also act as technical architect for the Retail Portal working closely with our Enterprise Architects.
* Agile methodologies: We are looking for someone who can practice agile methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban, effectively within the team.
* Communication skills: You should have excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, to convey technical information to both technical and non-technical team members and colleagues.
* Problem-solving skills: You will need to identify and solve complex technical problems, as well as anticipate and prevent potential issues before they arise. You conduct investigations to map the conditions for new development initiatives, define the backbone for new user stories and tasks and refine development initiatives together with the team.
* Team player: We value individuals who work collaboratively with other team members and other teams to achieve our goals. You cater for good collaboration within the team and ensure the team's work progresses efficiently and smoothly.
* Academic education in computer science or equivalent experience.
* At least 5 years of relevant working experience.


 Technical requirements
   

  

**Engineer Cloud AWS Focus**
* Expert knowledge of AWS Principles and how to build serverless architectures
* Tech Stack: Dynamo DB, PostgreSQL, S3, EventBridge, SNS/SQS, API GW
* Experience in Serverless Framework is required
* Experience/curiosity in front-end development (React, Vue, Angular) is a merit
* Experience in docker/container solutions like EC2, Fargate is a merit.


**Engineer Frontend Web Focus**
* Knowledge of Vue3, or other web app frameworks like React or Angular
* Knowledge in test automation frameworks like Cypress is a merit
* Experience with hosting web apps on AWS and CloudFront and Route 53 setup is a merit


**Language Requirements**
* Written and spoken professional level of English
* Swedish is a merit


 We offer you
   

  

**About**
 We are a modern, customer-oriented company that cares as much about our employees as we do about our customers. With us, you are offered a varied job in an international environment with constant new challenges and quick decisions. In addition to fair employment conditions according to collective agreements, we offer you:
   

  

* Flexible hybrid workplace, where we work from the office 3 days during the week and 2 days from home. Watch the film about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation
   

  

  

  

**About Us**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being the favourite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at group.postnord.com
   

  

  

  

 Apply
   

  

 Welcome to submit your application. Postnord will not provide re-location to Stockholm, Sweden. The selection is ongoing, so please apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions or concerns, please email spase.ristov@postnord.com
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Senior Utvecklare - Backend, API och Integrationer
description:
*Vill du vara med och förvalta/utveckla produkter som driver hundratusentals skärmar varje dag? Då kan detta vara rätt utmaning för dig.* 




*Visual Art utvecklar framtidens butikskommunikation med effektiva digital signage-lösningar. Våra lösningar driver över 75 000 skärmar i 39 länder för varumärken som McDonald’s, Circle K, KFC och Subway.* 




*Visual Art är en del av Vertiseit Group, noterat på Nasdaq First North Growth Market.* 




  





**Om rollen** 




 Som Senior utvecklare hos oss har du det tekniska ansvaret och kärnkompetens i vår digital signage-lösning. Du arbetar i ett team tillsammans med utvecklare och tekniker för att leverera nya, spännande och värdeskapande lösningar till Visual Arts kunder.
 



 Du kommer också vara en teknisk länk till det internationella utvecklingsteamet för vår centrala signage-mjukvara – och ha en nyckelroll i hur våra system kopplas ihop med kundernas.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden** 



* Förvalta och vidareutveckla äldre lösningar som fortfarande är kritiska för flera kundlösningar.
* Arbeta med moderna backend-lösningar och integrationer.
* Säkerställa kvalitet, stabilitet och säkerhet i våra produkter och integrationer.
* Jobba med integrationer mot kassasystem, produktdatabaser och lagersystem.
* Delta i kodgranskning, testning och releaseplanering.
* Arbeta nära supportteamet för att lösa komplexa incidenter (3rd line).
* Vara teknisk brygga mellan lokalt utvecklingsteam och Visual Arts globala mjukvaruutvecklingsteam.
* Ansvarig för framtagande av rapportpaket, externt och internt.



  





**Vem är du?** 




 För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du är lösningsorienterad, kommunikativ och gillar att ta ansvar. Du är strukturterad, trygg i dina tekniska beslut och bidrar gärna med förbättringar och nya perspektiv.
 



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 



* Flera års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, gärna inom media, retail eller signage.
* Tidigare erfarenheter i Visual Studio, C# och DevOps.
* Meriterande erfarenhet av Delphi (vissa äldre system).
* God förståelse för .NET, REST API:er, databaser och automatisering
* Erfarenhet av RSS-hantering, datahämtning och integrationer till externt dataflöde.
* Vana att arbeta med både äldre och nya system, och driva modernisering där det ger affärsnytta.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines, testdriven utveckling och säkerhetsaspekter i produktionsmiljö.
* En vilja att stötta kollegor, agera mentor och vara en kulturbärare inom teamet.



  





**Varför Visual Art?** 




 På Visual Art blir du en del av ett framåtlutat, värderingsstyrt och inkluderande bolag. Vi tror på ett hållbart arbetsliv där utveckling, delaktighet och teamkänsla är i fokus.
 


* En möjlighet att påverka teknisk riktning i en global tech-miljö.
* Samarbeta med ett passionerat och kompetent utvecklingsteam.
* En inkluderande kultur där ansvar, innovation och humor värderas högt.
* Tillgång till moderna verktyg, flexibla arbetsformer och en internationell vardag.



  





**Låter det intressant?** 




 Skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi intervjuar löpande, så vänta inte för länge. Har du frågor om rollen? Tveka inte att höra av dig till Country Manager Emily Lindqvist, emily.lindqvist@visualart.com

title: AI utvecklare till Sogeti Stockholm
description:
**AI Utvecklare till Sogeti Stockholm**
**Är du redo att forma framtiden genom att omvandla information till värde?**
 Sogeti strävar efter att hjälpa våra kunder genom både strategiska och operativa förbättringar. Vi tror på att utmana befintliga lösningar för att göra dem effektivare och att använda de senaste teknologierna för att skapa värde genom moderna tillämpningar som GenAI.
   

  

**Din roll:**
 Sogeti söker AI-experter som vill vara med och driva området i Stockholm i samarbete med kollegor i övriga landet och världen. Vi söker dig som är nyfiken, tekniskt skicklig och driven att förbättra och effektivisera verksamheter. Vi vill att du ska vara en lagspelare som är bra på att arbeta i team men även på att leverera på egen hand. Du är utåtriktad och gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknologierna. Att hjälpa kunder att identifiera användningsfall och skapa största möjliga värde är något du brinner för.
   

  

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**
* Tillämpa stora språkmodeller (LLM) på specifika affärsproblem för att extrahera, bearbeta, klassificera och härleda insikter från ostrukturerade datamängder.
* Utveckla domän- eller uppgiftsspecifika språkmodeller för affärsproblem när befintliga modeller inte kan användas.
* Utvärdera prestandan för maskininlärningsmodeller och ge rekommendationer för förbättringar.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad kring kärnteknologier inom NLP och generativ AI.
* Arbeta i tvärfunktionella team och ta gemensamt ägarskap och ansvar för planering, arbete, kvalitet och leverans.
* Agera mentor till juniora teammedlemmar för att bidra till en miljö där de får utvecklas genom stöd och support.


**Din profil:**
* Akademisk examen inom Data Science, Data, Machine Learning, Theoretical Linguistics eller motsvarande.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av stora språkmodeller (GPT, XLNet, T5, etc.).
* God erfarenhet av att använda moderna NLP-verktyg och bibliotek som spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers.
* Goda kunskaper i Python-utveckling inklusive bibliotek som NumPy, SciPy och erfarenhet av SQL.
* Duktig på att kommunicera och lära ut, förmåga att förklara tekniska koncept för icke-tekniska intressenter.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både skriftligt och muntligt.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att arbeta med både on-prem och molnplattformar, MS Azure är meriterande.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av vektordatabaser som Pinecone, Milvus eller Weaviate är meriterande.


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**
* Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.
* Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
* Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.
* Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.


**Ansökan:**
 Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager, Johan Alsén på mejl: johan@alsen@sogeti.se
   

  

 Genväg för snabb kontakt innan du ansöker? Självklart! Vi är bara två klick och ett micro-formulär bort. Första klicket
 **klicket här** 
 och du är igång.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 21 kontor och 1300 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.

title: Engine Graphics Programmer
description:
Are you passionate about graphics technology and creating immersive gaming experiences? Do you have a strong C++ background and a deep understanding of 3D graphics and GPU technologies? Join our Engine & Tools team as an
 **Engine Graphics Programmer** 
 , where you’ll help build and enhance the technical foundation for our games.
   

  

 At Paradox, we are a vibrant mix of game developers and publishers, known worldwide for our strategy games. We're passionate about our gamers, with an active player base of over five million each month across the globe. We bring our games to life, creating immersive experiences for our ever-growing community.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
 As an Engine Graphics Programmer, you will help design, implement, and maintain advanced graphical systems that bring our games to life. You’ll collaborate with game programmers, artists, and content designers to optimize their workflows and ensure high-quality visuals across platforms.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Help design, implement, and optimize graphical features, shaders, and rendering backends.
* Work closely with technical leads, game developers, and artists to align engine functionality with creative goals.
* Ensure systems meet performance benchmarks and run efficiently across platforms.


**What We’re Looking For**
* 3+ Years of C++ Programming Experience, Preferably in the game industry.
* Expertise in 3D Graphics & GPU Tech with strong knowledge of rendering pipelines, HLSL, and compute shaders.
* Experience with proprietary game engines and rendering APIs like DirectX12 and Vulkan.
* Ability to diagnose and resolve complex performance issues.
* Comfortable working with multithreaded environments.
* Ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly in English.


 Working at Paradox means being part of a team that values creativity and quality, where you can make a difference and shape the world of strategy gaming. We embrace our nerdy culture, regularly interact with our fans through forums and events, and end each Friday with a social hour to unwind and connect.
   

  

 If you're ready to take ownership of your work and grow as a game developer, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now and embark on an exciting journey with Paradox and the Engine & Tools team!
   

  

 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: Senior  Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Analysera befintliga och nya funktioner för att identifiera utvecklingsbehov
* Designa och implementera funktioner i gränssnitt och affärslogik
* Samverka med IFS-förvaltning, utvecklare och verksamhet för att säkerställa smidig utveckling
* Dokumentera funktioner, tekniska lösningar och lärdomar
* Dokumentera ur ett leveransperspektiv, så att genomförandet kan ske med god kvalitet kopplat till tid och felhantering
* Genomföra tester och verifiera att utvecklade funktioner är korrekta och användbara
* Hantera och lösa eventuella problem och/eller fel som uppstår under utvecklingsarbetet
* Ge teknisk support och vägledning till intressenter före, under och efter utvecklingsarbetet


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Systemvetarutbildning och/eller civilingenjörsutbildning inom IT/data eller minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet som systemutvecklare inom områden som vi bedömer likvärdigt
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av databashantering och SQL (Oracle)
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling i IFS affärssystem
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom skriptning
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av API:er relaterade till IFS
* Minst 3 års integrationserfarenhet av in- och utläsningar mot IFS
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta i projekt enligt agila DevOps metoder
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att analysera data och identifiera/hantera datakvalitetsproblem


**Meriterande**
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat inom IFS modulerna Asset Design, Asset management och/eller Linear Asset
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med och utvecklat i IFS Cloud


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 24-06-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.
